Key Match Events: Andrew Wiggins scored 18 of his 24 points in the third quarter
Dennis Schröder added 17 points and nine assists, both personal highs as a Warrior
Dennis Schröder recorded his fourth straight game in double figures
Lindy Waters began the second quarter with an 8-0 run, scoring eight straight points
Jonathan Kuminga exited with a right ankle sprain after landing awkwardly
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew Wiggins expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors improved to 10-8 at home on the season
The Warriors won their sixth consecutive home game against Memphis
The Warriors have won two of their last three games played at Chase Center
The teams meet for the fourth and final time on April 1 at Memphis
Tonight marked the Warriors’ league-high tying 22nd Clutch Game on the season
The Warriors improved to 11-2 when scoring 120-plus points this season
The Warriors improved to 10-4 when dishing out 30-plus assists and 4-0 when dishing out 30-or-more assists while making at least 50% of the team’s attempts from the field

The Warriors improved to 5-0 on the season when shooting 50%-or-better from the field; they have now made 50% of their attempts from the field in consecutive games after failing to achieve the feat for 22-straight games
The Warriors made a season-high 56.4% of their attempts from the 3-point line
The Warriors deployed their 19th unique starting lineup of the season
